mapper.select: SELECT FNAME, PID, PSN, TIM, LCN, FCN, TF, FEE, BAL, ATT,TT, CRN, XRN, EPID, ETIM, LPID, LTIM, TAC,FLAG FROM T_CPU_CONSUME_REVISE WHERE SETTLE_DATE=#{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ZIP_FILE_NAME=#{zipFileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT count(1) AS notesSum,SUM(TF) AS amountSum FROM T_CPU_CONSUME_REVISE WHERE FLAG='1' AND SETTLE_DATE=#{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ZIP_FILE_NAME=#{zipFileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
